title: ICosmeticThreadFeatureData.PatternedTransforms
description: Gets the transforms from this cosmetic thread for all of the instances of this cosmetic thread that are patterns of this feature.
returns: Array of the transforms of the instances of this cosmetic thread
remarks:
The value returned by this property does not include this cosmetic thread, which is the seed feature and not a pattern instance. Therefore, if this cosmetic thread is not used in a pattern feature, then
ICosmeticThreadFeatureData::GetPatternedTransformsCount
returns 0 and this property returns an empty array.

examples.title: Get Cosmetic Threads Features in a Part (VBA)
